name: Lady Parkour
description:
This game is made up when I was thinking about if I can make a game with only Game-Ready Assets. You are facing off with a 3D platformer game which will probably not be updated and it contains a few bugs. Also, you should not consider this game as a logical game but it is for fun.

If you trust your patience, you should give it a chance :D

Controls:

WASD to move

Left Ctrl to move slowly

Hold down Left Shift to Sprint

 Left Alt to crouch,  double click to roll

C to chance perspective of the camera

F to go back to start when you fall down

Espace or P to pause the game

 Any of the sounds and models are not belong to me and their resources are descriebed bottom;

Assets:

Advanced Locomotion System V4 (Epic Games Store - LongmireLocomotion)

Stylized Forest (Epic Games Store - TomkaGS)

FX Variety Pack (Epic Games Store - Kakky)

Paragon: Shinbi (Epic Games Store - Epic Games)

Shrek (SketchFab -  Neut2000);

"Shrek (2001)" (https://skfb.ly/oo7Iw) by Neut2000 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Donkey (SketchFab -  Neut2000);

"Pocket Shrek Donkey" (https://skfb.ly/ooCKz) by Neut2000 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Levan Polkka Music by Bilal Göregen;
